Question: Shenzhen Shounuoxin Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Shounuoxin Electronics Co., Ltd.

Product: Car Charger, Wireless Charger

- No.1 in-car charging product manufacturer in China
- Business scope includes Car Charger, MFI Car Charger with Cable, Mobile Data Cable, Wireless Charger, Car Mount
- Monthly production capacity exceeds 3 million units
- Provides OEM/ODM product & services for first-class customers
- Owns MFI, ISO9001, ISO14001, SA8000, CE, FCC, CB, PSE certifications
- Over 5% of revenue invested in product innovation and R&D annually
- Maintains strategic partnerships with original IC manufacturers
- Actively fulfills social responsibilities, ensuring employee income grows by over 15% annually
Summary_cn:
深圳市首诺新电子有限公司。

产品：汽车充电器，无线充电器

- 中国汽车充电产品制造商第一名
- 业务范围包括汽车充电器，带线MFI汽车充电器，移动数据线，无线充电器，汽车支架
- 月产能超过300万台
- 为一流客户提供OEM / ODM产品和服务
- 拥有MFI、ISO9001、ISO14001、SA8000、CE、FCC、CB、PSE认证
- 每年将营收的超过5%投入到产品创新和研发中
- 与原始IC制造商保持战略合作伙伴关系
- 积极履行社会责任，确保员工收入每年增长超过15%
